osmViewer.data
Class Tower

java.lang.Object
  org.jdesktop.swingx.mapviewer.GeoPosition
      guts.entities.Location
          osmViewer.data.Tower

public class Tower
extends Location

The tower class is used as a waypoint, but also as location to calculate the antenna orientation
